alert.note: Alert for Clay; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 7:09PM CDT until June 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in north central Kansas... Southwestern Washington County in north central Kansas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 709 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Barnes to near Morganville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clay Center, Wakefield, Clifton, Morganville, Green, Palmer, Vining and Idana. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
